name: Magic Circus Balloons
description:
Here comes the Magic Circus!

You are the star of the best number of this circus.

Try to avoid the explosion of the balloons against the spikes. Could be so easy in the beginning, but you must to be concentrated to get them perfect.

Magic Circus Balloons contains 4 game modes to challenge your skills. You can show your talents in the float, pop, free float and free pop mode.

Can you get the highscore and win against your friends and family?

Download this free game and enjoy everywhere with your iPhone or iPad.


Features:
- 4 game modes
- Easy to learn with tutorials
- For all ages
- Beautiful graphics
- Cool sounds and music
